block.p: O'REILLY-Bernard (Bernie). Suddenly, on October 24, 2000. 62 years. Businessman and consultant to the computer industry. Beloved son of Catherine and the late Bernard. Loving brother of Patrick and Thomas. Also survived by many nieces and nephews. Family will receive friends Friday, 2:00-5:00 and 7:00-9:00 PM at Williams Funeral Home, 5628 Broadway at 232 St., Bronx. Mass of Christian burial will be celebrated at St. Margaret's of Cortona Church, Saturday, 11:00 AM.
